extensionDescription.message: Meet your perfect web surfing companion! Our extension helps you take notes effortlessly while browsing.

extensionName.message: Web Memo - Your Smart Note-Taking Assistant

no_memo.message: You don't have any memos yet. Ready to create your first one?

modal_modal_question_delete.message: Would you like to reset all your data? This action cannot be undone.

select_language.message: Choose your preferred language for prompt responses

toast_save_option.message: Great! Your settings have been saved successfully.

toast_error_common.message: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

toast_saved.message: Perfect! Your changes have been saved successfully.

error_get_page_content.message: Sorry, but we can't summarize content from New Tab, Chrome Web Store, or Chrome Settings pages. Please visit a different webpage and click the retry button on the right. If you've just installed the app, try refreshing the page once.

error_get_summary.message: We couldn't create your summary this time. Please try again! If you keep seeing this error, we're here to help - just reach out to us through the contact information in the 'Guide'.

error_get_storage.message: We couldn't access your stored data. Please try again.

toast_error_storage_exceeded.message: Looks like your storage is full! Try removing some old items to make space.

wish_list_deleted.message: We've removed this item from your wish list!

wish_list_added.message: Great choice! Added to your wish list successfully!

toast_error_save.message: Sorry, we couldn't save your memo. Please try again.
